casebody.data:
HOLCOMBE, et al.
v.
OAK ISLAND AIRCRAFT HOUSING, LLC, et al. 170P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Christopher A. Chleborowicz, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Elijah A.T. Huston, Attorney at Law, for 717, NC, LLC, et al. G. Grady Richardson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Holcombe, Claudia, et al. Randolph M. James, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Stephenson, Kevin W. Charles D. Meier, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Martin, Robert, et al.

Benedict J. Del Re, Jr., Attorney at Law, Holden Beach.

Kimberly L. Moore, Attorney at Law, Southport, for Martin, John M.

Dawn Walton

*291The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2018 by Plaintiffs (Claudia Holcombe, Tom Pelton, and Dos Aves, LLC) to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
